messages.subject: Subject: Re: Pagan Unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: I think there s a pagan unschooling list (or maybe it s pagan homeschoolers), that branched off of the Unschooling Discussion list.  It was a while back...is
messages.messageBody:
I think there's a pagan unschooling list (or maybe it's pagan
homeschoolers), that branched off of the Unschooling Discussion list. It
was a while
back...is it still in existance?

**There is a list called "Pagan Homeschool" that was started by me and dozen
or so other women about ten years ago. We met on some AOL boards and
discovered that we had more in common than educational decisions. This list
is still in existence although many of us oldtimers are no longer there. It
is not promarily an unschooling list....just as with all segments of
society, there are as many ways that pagans hs as there are pagans...more,
in fact <G>....like herding cats, you know.

Lori Collner
Pagan Homeschool columnist for "The Blesse Bee"
